description: Internet Explorer 5.x and 6.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary programs via a modified directory traversal attack using a URL containing ".." (dot dot) sequences and a filename that ends in "::" which is treated as a .chm file even if it does not have a .chm extension.  NOTE: this bug may overlap CVE-2004-0475.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2003-1041

description: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator (ePO) 2.5.1 Patch 13 and 3.0 SP2a Patch 3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via certain HTTP POST requests to the spipe/file handler on ePO TCP port 81.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0038

description: Verity Ultraseek before 5.2.2 allows remote attackers to obtain the full pathname of the document root via an MS-DOS device name in the web search option, such as (1) NUL, (2) CON, (3) AUX, (4) COM1, (5) COM2, and others.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0050

description: Buffer overflow in the ISO9660 file system component for Linux kernel 2.4.x, 2.5.x and 2.6.x, allows local users with physical access to overflow kernel memory and execute arbitrary code via a malformed CD containing a long symbolic link entry.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0109

description: An Activation function in the RPCSS Service involved with DCOM activation for Microsoft Windows 2000, XP, and 2003 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via an activation request with a large length field.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0116

description: Unknown vulnerability in the H.323 protocol implementation in Windows 98, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and Windows Server 2003 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0117

description: The component for the Virtual DOS Machine (VDM) subsystem in Windows NT 4.0 and Windows 2000 does not properly validate system structures, which allows local users to access protected kernel memory and execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0118

description: The Negotiate Security Software Provider (SSP) interface in Windows 2000, Windows XP, and Windows Server 2003, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash from null dereference) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted SPNEGO NegTokenInit request during authentication protocol selection.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0119

description: The Microsoft Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) library, as used in Windows 2000, Windows XP, and Windows Server 2003, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via malformed SSL messages.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0120

description: Double free vulnerability in the ASN.1 library as used in Windows NT 4.0, Windows 2000, Windows XP, and Windows Server 2003, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0123

description: The DCOM RPC interface for Microsoft Windows NT 4.0, 2000, XP, and Server 2003 allows remote attackers to cause network communications via an "alter context" call that contains additional data, aka the "Object Identity Vulnerability."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0124

description: The XFS file system code in Linux 2.4.x has an information leak in which in-memory data is written to the device for the XFS file system, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading the raw device.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0133

description: rpc.mountd in nfs-utils after 1.0.3 and before 1.0.6 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via an NFS mount of a directory from a client whose reverse DNS lookup name is different from the forward lookup name.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0154

description: The KAME IKE Daemon Racoon, when authenticating a peer during Phase 1, validates the X.509 certificate but does not verify the RSA signature authentication, which allows remote attackers to establish unauthorized IP connections or conduct man-in-the-middle attacks using a valid, trusted X.509 certificate.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0155

description: Format string vulnerabilities in the (1) die or (2) log_event functions for ssmtp before 2.50.6 allow remote mail relays to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0156

description: x11.c in xonix 1.4 and earlier uses the current working directory to find and execute the rmail program, which allows local users to execute arbitrary code by modifying the path to point to a malicious rmail program.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0157

description: The ext3 code in Linux 2.4.x before 2.4.26 does not properly initialize journal descriptor blocks, which causes an information leak in which in-memory data is written to the device for the ext3 file system, which allows privileged users to obtain portions of kernel memory by reading the raw device.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0177

description: The OSS code for the Sound Blaster (sb16) driver in Linux 2.4.x before 2.4.26, when operating in 16 bit mode, does not properly handle certain sample sizes, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (crash) via a sample with an odd number of bytes.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0178

description: Multiple format string vulnerabilities in (1) neon 0.24.4 and earlier, and other products that use neon including (2) Cadaver, (3) Subversion, and (4) OpenOffice, allow remote malicious WebDAV servers to execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0179

description: The client for CVS before 1.11 allows a remote malicious CVS server to create arbitrary files using certain RCS diff files that use absolute pathnames during checkouts or updates, a different vulnerability than CVE-2004-0405.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0180

description: The JFS file system code in Linux 2.4.x has an information leak in which in-memory data is written to the device for the JFS file system, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading the raw device.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0181

description: Mailman before 2.0.13 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via an email message with an empty subject field.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0182

description: Buffer overflow in Microsoft Jet Database Engine 4.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a specially-crafted database query.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0197

description: Help and Support Center in Microsoft Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 SP1 does not properly validate HCP URLs, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code, as demonstrated using certain hcp:// URLs that access the DVD Upgrade capability (dvdupgrd.htm).

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0199

description: Buffer overflow in the zms script in ZoneMinder before 1.19.2 may allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via a long query string.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0227

description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Oracle 9i Application Server Web Cache 9.0.4.0.0, 9.0.3.1.0, 9.0.2.3.0, and 9.0.0.4.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a long HTTP request method header to the Web Cache listener.  NOTE: due to the vagueness of the Oracle advisory, it is not clear whether there are additional issues besides this overflow, although the advisory alludes to multiple "vulnerabilities."

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0385

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the RT3 plugin, as used in RealPlayer 8, RealOne Player, RealOne Player 10 beta, and RealOne Player Enterprise, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a malformed .R3T file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0387

description: The mysqld_multi script in MySQL allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0388

description: RealNetworks Helix Universal Server 9.0.1 and 9.0.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via malformed requests that trigger a null dereference, as demonstrated using (1) GET_PARAMETER or (2) DESCRIBE requests.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0389

description: Cisco Wireless LAN Solution Engine (WLSE) 2.0 through 2.5 and Hosting Solution Engine (HSE) 1.7 through 1.7.3 have a hardcoded username and password, which allows remote attackers to add new users, modify existing users, and change configuration.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0391

description: racoon before 20040407b allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop and dropped connections) via an IKE message with a malformed Generic Payload Header containing invalid (1) "Security Association Next Payload" and (2) "RESERVED" fields.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0392

description: Heap-based buffer overflow in CVS 1.11.x up to 1.11.15, and 1.12.x up to 1.12.7, when using the pserver mechanism allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via Entry lines.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0396

description: Racoon before 20040408a allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via an ISAKMP packet with a large length field.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0403

description: CVS before 1.11 allows CVS clients to read arbitrary files via .. (dot dot) sequences in filenames via CVS client requests, a different vulnerability than CVE-2004-0180.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0405

description: The HTML form upload capability in ColdFusion MX 6.1 does not reclaim disk space if an upload is interrupted, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (disk consumption) by repeatedly uploading files and interrupting the uploads before they finish.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0407

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the Socks-5 proxy code for XChat 1.8.0 to 2.0.8, with socks5 traversal enabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0409

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1346

description: The DNS proxy (DNSd) for multiple Symantec Gateway Security products allows remote attackers to poison the DNS cache via a malicious DNS server query response that contains authoritative or additional records.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-1754

description: PHP-Nuke 7.3, and other products that use the PHP-Nuke codebase such as the Nuke Cops betaNC PHP-Nuke Bundle, OSCNukeLite 3.1, and OSC2Nuke 7x do not properly use the eregi() PHP function with $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] to identify the calling script, which allows remote attackers to directly access scripts, obtain path information via a PHP error message, and possibly gain access, as demonstrated using an HTTP request that contains the "admin.php" string.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-2044

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0397

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0399

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Exim 4 before 4.33, when the headers_check_syntax option is enabled, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code during the header check.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0400

description: Unknown vulnerability in libtasn1 0.1.x before 0.1.2, and 0.2.x before 0.2.7, related to the DER parsing functions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0401

description: Buffer overflow in xpcd-svga in xpcd before 2.08, and possibly other versions, may allow local users to execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0402

description: logcheck before 1.1.1 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a temporary directory in /var/tmp.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0404

description: The URI handlers in Konqueror for KDE 3.2.2 and earlier do not properly filter "-" characters that begin a hostname in a (1) telnet, (2) rlogin, (3) ssh, or (4) mailto URI, which allows remote attackers to manipulate the options that are passed to the associated programs, possibly to read arbitrary files or execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0411

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0420

description: flim before 1.14.3 creates temporary files insecurely, which allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files of the Emacs user via a symlink attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0422

description: The log_event function in ssmtp 2.50.6 and earlier allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on the ssmtp.log temporary log file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0423

description: Integer overflow in the ip_setsockopt function in Linux kernel 2.4.22 through 2.4.25 and 2.6.1 through 2.6.3 allows local users to cause a denial of service (crash) or execute arbitrary code via the MCAST_MSFILTER socket option.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0424

description: rsync before 2.6.1 does not properly sanitize paths when running a read/write daemon without using chroot, which allows remote attackers to write files outside of the module's path.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0426

description: The do_fork function in Linux 2.4.x before 2.4.26, and 2.6.x before 2.6.6, does not properly decrement the mm_count counter when an error occurs after the mm_struct for a child process has been activated, which triggers a memory leak that allows local users to cause a denial of service (memory exhaustion) via the clone (CLONE_VM) system call.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0427

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in AppleFileServer for Mac OS X 10.3.3 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a LoginExt packet for a Cleartext Password User Authentication Method (UAM) request with a PathName argument that includes an AFPName type string that is longer than the associated length field.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0430

description: Integer overflow in Apple QuickTime (QuickTime.qts) before 6.5.1 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a large "number of entries" field in the sample-to-chunk table data for a .mov movie file, which leads to a heap-based buffer overflow.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0431

description: k5admind (kadmind) for Heimdal allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a Kerberos 4 compatibility administration request whose framing length is less than 2, which leads to a heap-based buffer overflow.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0434

description: Titan FTP Server version 3.01 build 163, and possibly other versions before build 169, allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (crash) by disconnecting from the system during a "LIST -L" command, which causes Titan to access an invalid socket.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0437

description: Multiple vulnerabilities in SYMDNS.SYS for Symantec Norton Internet Security and Professional 2002 through 2004, Norton Personal Firewall 2002 through 2004, Norton AntiSpam 2004, Client Firewall 5.01 and 5.1.1, and Client Security 1.0 through 2.0 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code via (1) a manipulated length byte in the first-level decoding routine for NetBIOS Name Service (NBNS) that modifies an index variable and leads to a stack-based buffer overflow, (2) a heap-based corruption problem in an NBNS response that is missing certain RR fields, and (3) a stack-based buffer overflow in the DNS component via a Resource Record (RR) with a long canonical name (CNAME) field composed of many smaller components.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0444

description: The SYMDNS.SYS driver in Symantec Norton Internet Security and Professional 2002 through 2004, Norton Personal Firewall 2002 through 2004, Norton AntiSpam 2004, Client Firewall 5.01 and 5.1.1, and Client Security 1.0 through 2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption from infinite loop) via a DNS response with a compressed name pointer that points to itself.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0445

description: The Clear Channel Assessment (CCA) algorithm in the IEEE 802.11 wireless protocol, when using DSSS transmission encoding, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a certain RF signal that causes a channel to appear busy (aka "jabber"), which prevents devices from transmitting data.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0459

description: Buffer overflow in the ISAKMP functionality for Check Point VPN-1 and FireWall-1 NG products, before VPN-1/FireWall-1 R55 HFA-03, R54 HFA-410 and NG FP3 HFA-325, or VPN-1 SecuRemote/SecureClient R56, may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code during VPN tunnel negotiation.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0469

description: BEA WebLogic Server and WebLogic Express 7.0 through SP5 and 8.1 through SP2, when editing weblogic.xml using WebLogic Builder or the SecurityRoleAssignmentMBean.toXML method, inadvertently removes security-role-assignment tags when weblogic.xml does not have a principal-name tag, which can remove intended access restrictions for the associated web application.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0470

description: BEA WebLogic Server and WebLogic Express 7.0 through SP5 and 8.1 through SP2 does not enforce site restrictions for starting and stopping servers for users in the Admin and Operator security roles, which allows unauthorized users to cause a denial of service (service shutdown).

cvss2.cvss2_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0472

description: Argument injection vulnerability in Opera before 7.50 does not properly filter "-" characters that begin a hostname in a telnet URI, which allows remote attackers to insert options to the resulting command line and overwrite arbitrary files via (1) the "-f" option on Windows XP or (2) the "-n" option on Linux.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0473

description: Help Center (HelpCtr.exe) may allow remote attackers to read or execute arbitrary files via an "http://" or "file://" argument to the topic parameter in an hcp:// URL.  NOTE: since the initial report of this problem, several researchers have been unable to reproduce this issue.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0474

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0475

description: Unknown versions of Mozilla allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (high CPU/RAM consumption) using Javascript with an infinite loop  that continues to add input to a form, possibly as the result of inserting control characters, as demonstrated using an embedded ctrl-U.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0478

description: Internet Explorer 6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via Javascript that creates a new popup window and disables the imagetoolbar functionality with a META tag, which triggers a null dereference.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0479

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0482

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0484

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0485

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0486

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0488

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0489

description: 4D WebSTAR 5.3.2 and earlier allows local users to read and modify arbitrary files via a symlink attack.

description: Format string vulnerability in the mod_proxy hook functions function in ssl_engine_log.c in mod_ssl before 2.8.19 for Apache before 1.3.31 may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary messages via format string specifiers in certain log messages for HTTPS that are handled by the ssl_log function.

description: Sun Ray Server Software (SRSS) 1.3 and 2.0 for Solaris 2.6, 7 and 8 does not properly detect a smartcard removal when the card is quickly removed, reinserted, and removed again, which could cause a user session to stay logged in and allow local users to gain unauthorized access.

description: DBI in Bugzilla 2.17.1 through 2.17.7 displays the database password in an error message when the SQL server is not running, which could allow remote attackers to gain sensitive information.

description: HP OpenView Select Access 5.0 through 6.0 does not correctly decode UTF-8 encoded unicode characters in a URL, which could allow remote attackers to bypass access restrictions.

description: IP Security VPN Services Module (VPNSM) in Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series Switch and the Cisco 7600 Series Internet Routers running IOS before 12.2(17b)SXA, before 12.2(17d)SXB, or before 12.2(14)SY03 could allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device crash and reload) via a malformed Internet Key Exchange (IKE) packet.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0710

description: The URL pattern matching feature in BEA WebLogic Server 6.x matches illegal patterns ending in "*" as wildcards as if they were the legal "/*" pattern, which could cause WebLogic 7.x to allow remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions because the illegal patterns are properly rejected.
